comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: Machine is misidentified as a Wright NW-1. The picture shows Nieuport-Delage monoplane flown to 1st place in the 1922 Deutsch de la Meurthe Cup Race, an annual French event, by Sadi Lecointe. He set a new world speed record in the same ship in 1923, travelling 234,66 mph. Engine is a 420 hp Hispano V-8. Source is Reed Kinert. Racing planes and air races - a complete history - Volume 1, page 72 gives exactly the same picture, with the given caption.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
